code:
import axios from'axios';const API_BASE_URL='http://localhost:5000';const api=axios.create({baseURL:API_BASE_URL,headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'}});// Add token to requests
api.interceptors.request.use(config=>{const token=localStorage.getItem('token');if(token){config.headers.Authorization="Bearer ".concat(token);}return config;},error=>{return Promise.reject(error);});export default api;
